description: A protocol for isolation of protoplast from plant cells adapted from Yoo et al. 2007 (http://www.nature.com/nprot/journal/v2/n7/full/nprot.2007.199.htm). Procedure was optimized for use on Arabidopsis thaliana tissue.
warning: This protocol worked best for dicot species, yields from monocot leaves were low.
manuscript_citation: Yu Z, Boehm CR, Hibberd JM, Abell C, Haseloff J, Burgess SJ, Reyna-Llorens I (2018) Droplet-based microfluidic analysis and screening of single plant cells. PLoS ONE 13(5): e0196810. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0196810

components.data: Grow plants of Arabidopsis thaliana (ecotype Col0) on a 3:1 (v/v) compost to vermiculite mixture at 20oC, under short day conditions (12h light:12h dark) and low light intensities (50-100µE m-2 s-1).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Grow plants of Arabidopsis thaliana (ecotype Col0) on a 3:1 (v/v) compost to vermiculite mixture at 20oC, under short day conditions (12h light:12h dark) and low light intensities (50-100µE m-2 s-1).

components.data: Prepare fresh enzyme solution and transfer to glass petridish.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare fresh enzyme solution and transfer to glass petridish.

Enzyme solution for the isolation of protoplasts suitable for Arabidopsis thaliana and Nicotiana benthamiana. Adapted from Yoo et al. 2007 http://www.nature.com/nprot/journal/v2/n7/full/nprot.2007.199.html

And excellent video from the Sheen Lab is available: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5-xm1EoLrW4
source_data.manuscript_citation: Yu Z, Boehm CR, Hibberd JM, Abell C, Haseloff J, Burgess SJ, Reyna-Llorens I, Droplet-based microfluidic analysis and screening of single plant cells. PLoS ONE 13(5). doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0196810

components.data: 500mM MES, pH 5.6
components.name: Description

source_data.annotation: Final concentration is 10mM. Yoo et al. 2007 mention that MES is preheated to 70oC for 3-5 minutes prior to addition of the enzyme powder.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Protoplast Isolation - Enzyme Buffer

components.data: Heat the enzyme solution at 55oC for 10 min, then allow to cool to room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Heat the enzyme solution at 55oC for 10 min, then allow to cool to room temperature.

components.data:
1M Calcium Chloride

CaCl2
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1M Calcium Chloride

CaCl2

components.data: Filter final solution through a 0.45-μm syringe filter.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter final solution through a 0.45-μm syringe filter.

components.data: Remove 20-40 leaves from 4 week old Arabidopsis thaliana rosettes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove 20-40 leaves from 4 week old Arabidopsis thaliana rosettes.

components.data: Pile up 5-10 leaves at a time, cut into thin (~2mm) strips across the leaf using a sharp scapel blade dipped into ethanol. Place strips into enzyme solution. Repeat until all leaves have been cut.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pile up 5-10 leaves at a time, cut into thin (~2mm) strips across the leaf using a sharp scapel blade dipped into ethanol. Place strips into enzyme solution. Repeat until all leaves have been cut.

components.data: Vacuum infiltrate the enzyme solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Vacuum infiltrate the enzyme solution.

components.data: Leave cells in the petri dish at 20oC without shaking.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Leave cells in the petri dish at 20oC without shaking.

components.data: Twice filter cells and enzyme solution through a 125μm nylon mesh to remove residual debris into a pointed bottom, glass test tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Twice filter cells and enzyme solution through a 125μm nylon mesh to remove residual debris into a pointed bottom, glass test tube.

components.data: Leave cells to settle to the bottom of the tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Leave cells to settle to the bottom of the tube.

components.data: Carefully aspirate out the liquid solution leaving the cell pellet intact.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Carefully aspirate out the liquid solution leaving the cell pellet intact.

components.data: Add Incubation Buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add Incubation Buffer

Instructions to make 50 mL of incubation buffer for protoplast isolation.

Adapted from Yoo et al. 2007 http://www.nature.com/nprot/journal/v2/n7/full/nprot.2007.199.html
source_data.manuscript_citation: Yu Z, Boehm CR, Hibberd JM, Abell C, Haseloff J, Burgess SJ, Reyna-Llorens I, Droplet-based microfluidic analysis and screening of single plant cells. PLoS ONE 13(5). doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0196810

components.data: Gently resuspend protoplast in incubation solution by light swirling of the test tube.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of Arabidopsis Protoplast Isolation
source_data.annotation: Note: You cannot view protoplasts on a flat glass slide with a coverslip as they will burst.
source_data.thread_text: Note: You cannot view protoplasts on a flat glass slide with a coverslip as they will burst.
source_data.body: Note: You cannot view protoplasts on a flat glass slide with a coverslip as they will burst.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of Arabidopsis Protoplast Isolation
source_data.annotation: Protoplasts are extremely fragile, it is best to avoid pipetting up and down or shaking vigorously as the shearing forces can cause cells to rupture.
source_data.thread_text: Protoplasts are extremely fragile, it is best to avoid pipetting up and down or shaking vigorously as the shearing forces can cause cells to rupture.
source_data.body: Protoplasts are extremely fragile, it is best to avoid pipetting up and down or shaking vigorously as the shearing forces can cause cells to rupture.

components.data: Check protoplast integrity and determine yield using a disposable hemocytomer.
components.name: Description

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 12 of Arabidopsis Protoplast Isolation
source_data.annotation: Diltute cells as necessary with extra incubation buffer.
